summary:
a follow-up to Freya
adds another follower to the sleeping giant inn, this time a Mage
descriptionHtml:
a few subscribers on the steam workshop requested a mage follower so i created Deedra a dark elf mage specializing in lightning magic and her level scales up to 80 just like Freya
she also has several low tier and high tier spell including the ability to conjure a storm elemental making her a valid late game companion as well

As always comment like , etc., and provide me with support as I am still a novice modder :)

===========================================

Suggested mods for this file:
just Cover eyes (i used the dark elf unique eyes)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869&navtag=file/images.php?id=4869&tab=3

===========================================

Future Plans:

- a new tank follower
- possible spell-sword follower
- I\'m going to attempt a mini centurion pet (won\'t replace follower)

=============================================================
Tips for making your own follower:

in factions make sure u have 
PotentialFollowerFaction = 0 (from what i read this gives u the \"i need your help\" dialogue) 
CurrentFollowerFaction = -1 
in relationships make a new form and in the \"Child\" field go all the way to \"P\" and find Player then set your relationship to what you see fit (i suggest Ally) 
and make sure in \"scripts\" you add \"CarryActorScript\" this lets you open the npc\'s inv if not then it just sends u back to the dialogue choices 

im not sure if you need it but if that still doesn\'t work add \"DunPlayerAllyFaction\" to factions
author: xxwarcryxx
